staxel.village.character.dialogue.LeifBa: Hmm...
I wonder if I should try approaching ^c:1486b0;{0-c_name}^c:pop;...
She's been on my mind a lot recently...
There was a scientist who lived around here up until recently.
I wish she'd come back...
I wanted to talk to her.
I often feel a bit homesick...
It comes and goes.
I miss feeling leaves beneath my feet...
Or sleeping under the protective canopy of the trees.
I wonder how my sisters are doing?
Perhaps they will have headed out into the world by now.
Would that I could be out there with them!
(안함)People always ask me to do things for them...
(안함)I never turn them down.
(안함)Sometimes it's hard to get everything done on time...
(안함)It's so nice not to have any rowdy people in town!
(안함)I can lie in the grass and read a book without being disturbed.
(안함)I wish ^c:1486b0;{0-tomboy_name}^c:pop; would be a bit less rowdy...
(안함)She makes such a racket whenever she's about the town.
(안함)It's a bit intimidating.
(안함)It can be pretty hard to be spontaneous with people you've only just met.
(안함)I prefer to think carefully about what I want to say.
(안함)Plan ahead so that I don't say anything stupid, you know?
(안함)It might not seem like it at first, but I actually really enjoy a good chat.
(안함)I think most of us here in the village do!
(안함)Get to know people a bit better and I'm sure they'll start to open up to you.
(안함)I'd love to go out and see more of the world.
(안함)I don't really have the time for it though.
(안함)Even if I did, I'm not sure I'd be able to brave it alone!
(안함)If I say I'll do something, nothing will stop me from getting it done.
(안함)There are few things worse than being unreliable.
